content.rendered:
Cordelia Cruise Chennai to Chennai

Home » Cordelia Cruise » Cordelia Cruise Chennai to Chennai

Tour Overview

A luxury cruise holiday with never-ending views of the ocean and soaking in the beauty of blue water and a beautiful sky, while you sail in the Bay of Bengal. You embark on this ultimate experience with the Cordelia cruise in Chennai and spend two days on this ultra-luxurious and comfortable cruise which gives you a royal feel. A holiday where you can spend some memorable moments with your loved ones with some engaging activities and a variety of lavish amenities. Enjoy the best delicacies from all over the world and make the most of your vacation on the cruise.

You can have the best time of your life, filled with entertainment with some amusing magic shows and dance performances on the cruise, and try your luck in the casino. If you are looking for a soothing holiday with yourself, you can board the cruise, grab your drink, and enjoy it with a mesmerizing view of the sea. Make the best memories of your life on this 2-day cruise holiday with the Cordelia cruise.

Cordelia Cruise Chennai Tour Itinerary

Day 1 :Board the Cruise from Chennai

Start your cruise journey from Chennai, a city known for its culture and food. Check in your luxurious rooms after boarding the cruise and make yourself feel comfortable. Enjoy the party at the cruise with the fragrance of exotic flowers, light and beautiful music, and scrumptious food at the bars and lounges.

Day 2 :A Day in the Water

Enjoy your day at the sea, looking at the never-ending views in the Bay of Bengal, and get lost in the beauty of the sea. Have some good drinks, spend time with your loved ones, or just with yourself reading a book with those views. Rejuvenate yourself on this cruise holiday with a spa session on the cruise. Entertain yourself with some engaging musical and magic show performances at the theatre. Try your luck at the casino, or just enjoy the old-fashioned games with your loved ones at the game zone.

Day 3 :Back to Chennai

Arrive in Chennai with some unforgettable memories of a lavish and mesmerizing holiday.

Price Details

Tour Name Cordelia Cruise Chennai to Chennai
Duration 3 Days / 2 Nights
Destinations Chennai
Tour Price On Request

Chat with specialist who can help plan your tour!

  • +91-971 1616 316

    Holiday Your Way with Namaste India Trip!

    Filling out the information form provided allows you to receive the best budget-friendly customized itinerary in just a few hours.

    • We assure the privacy of your contact data.

    • This data will only be used by our team to contact you and no other purposes.

    Trip Highlights

    • A beautiful 2-day cruise experience with ultra-comfortable and luxurious stay and mesmerizing views.
    • Lavish amenities to rejuvenate yourself on your vacation, including premium spas, pools, and whatnot.
    • Not one, but multiple restaurants on the cruise to serve you the best Indian and International delicacies, the food on the cruise will just make your day.
    • Casinos to have a fun time with your friends and family on your holiday, try your luck on your journey, and spend some good time with loved ones.
    • A journey full of entertainment with multiple shows in the theatre including musical performances, dance performances, and magic shows.
    • A special zone for your little ones, where they would love to spend their time with a lot of fun-filled games and activities.
    • Not just for the kids, but a separate fun and games zone for adults, with all the indoor games including video games, relive your childhood on this vacation.
    • If you are a book lover, the cruise has a special reading room for you, a space with breathtaking views and ultimate silence.

    Things To Remember

    • It is very important to follow all the rules and policies when you are on the cruise.
    • Be very attentive during the instructions session before the cruise starts sailing, as it is very important and comes in handy in case of any emergency.
    • If you are consuming alcohol on the cruise, do it very responsibly.
    • If you have a room with a balcony, never leave the doors of the balcony open if you are not in the room, or sleeping.
    • Be extra cautious with your room’s key card and always keep it with you carefully, also ensure that you have all the necessary documents with you all the time on the cruise.
    • In case you feel sick on the cruise, immediately contact the medical staff on-board.
    • It is always better to book your trip in advance, to avoid any hassle of last-minute bookings.
    • Visitors are not allowed to carry any kind of alcoholic beverages on the cruise, you can consume the alcohol served on board.
    • In case of any existing medical conditions, it is very important to inform the cruise at the time of booking, pregnant women are not advised to board the cruise.
    • The guests are not allowed to any of the performers or crew on the cruise.

    Package Inclusions

    • The package includes all your meals on the cruise.
    • It includes access to the swimming pool, lounges, and other amenities.
    • It includes access to entertaining performances and DJ parties.

    Package Exclusions

    • The package doesn’t include your travel to Chennai, and to the meeting location if you are traveling from any other city.
    • It doesn’t include any alcoholic beverage

    FAQs for Cordelia Cruise Chennai to Chennai

    Q. Do We Need To Buy Separate Tickets For Kids?

    A. Infants aged 0-6 months are not permitted on the cruise. Children up to two years can board the cruise free of cost, accompanied by an adult.

    Q. What Are The Different Varieties Of Rooms On The Cruise?

    A. Cordelia Cruise has 5 different stay options for the guests, this includes, an interior room with no view, an ocean view room, a mini-suite, a suite, and a chairman’s suite. The tariff of these rooms varies according to the demand.

    Q. What Is The Cancellation Policy At Cordelia Cruise?

    A. If you cancel your trip 31 days before the travel date, you will be charged 25% of the total amount, if cancellation is made 15 days before the travel date, you will be charged 50% of the booking amount. If less than 15 days are left for your trip and you decide to cancel, the entire booking amount will be charged as cancellation fees.

    Q. What Are Your Age Criteria For An Adult?

    A. Any individual who is above 13 years of age will be counted as an adult and will be charged accordingly.

    Q. What Are The Payment Terms At The Time Of Booking?

    A. To book your cruise experience, you need to pay 100% amount in advance while booking.
